definitions.definition: a person that travels to a different country or place, often in order to find work:
examples: The cities are full of migrants looking for work.

definitions.definition: an animal that moves from one place to another at different times of the year:
examples: These birds are winter migrants from Scandinavia.

moving from one place to another at different times of year:
